projects.name: URL Shortener Service
projects.description: A high-performance URL shortener backend that supports fast redirects, caching via Redis, rate limiting, and basic click analytics. Designed with clean layered architecture and follows REST API best practices.

projects.name: E-Commerce Backend System
projects.description: A complete backend system for an e-commerce platform featuring user authentication, product management, cart handling, order workflows, and role-based access control. Built using clean code and database-driven architecture.
